table.caption: Description of SolidFire driver configuration options

tr.td: (StrOpt) Create SolidFire accounts with this prefix. Any string can be used here, but the string "hostname" is special and will create a prefix using the cinder node hostsname (previous default behavior). The default is NO prefix.
(BoolOpt) Allow tenants to specify QOS on create
(IntOpt) SolidFire API port. Useful if the device api is behind a proxy on a different port.
(BoolOpt) Set 512 byte emulation on volume creation;
